name: Lock'n'Roll
description:
Lock'n'Roll is a relaxing sokoban-like puzzle game where you have the ability to control other objects movement depending on the dice position. Will you be able to solve all levels ?

This game has been made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, the theme was Roll of the Dice. I hope you will enjoy the game !

Controls : 

  • Arrows Keys : Move
  • Space : Lock / Unlock
  • U : Undo
  • R : Reset
  • M : Mute / Unmute
  • Escape : Level Selection
  • Hold escape : Leave the game :(

Everything has been made by me using the Monogame framework, except the music : https://opengameart.org/content/napping-on-a-cloud
